name: Chomper And Pals Jump!
description:
Get ready to Jump! Play as Chomper and the rest of his friends as they take a break from adventuring and go jumping! Play as wonderful and cute characters such as Chomper, Mr. Radishpants, Dogenstein, and more! Join the Jump! Play today!

What's new?

  • MAJOR UPDATES:
    • Added 5 new characters: Chompella, Mouseigor, Pounce, Chompah, and G O N E!
    • Added a new stage, The Nothing, G O N E's one and only "home"!
    • Added 2 new music tracks for two stages: Cartoon World and The Nothing!
  • MINOR UPDATES:
    • Fixed the code so that it'll be easier to add characters and stages.
    • Removed Snuggles.
